name: Bikash Subedi
introduction:
'This is Bikash Subedi's website, and this is a bit of copy about him, It's not enough intro about him.'

Bikash is in IT Faculty, He has a lots of knowledge about Digital World, Content & Contents Rules, Cyber Security, Programming, Cisco, Web, (AND MORE): Active in Podcasts, Videos, Ebooks, Webinars: That Engage Customers and Ignite Your Business (Professional With Champion)

His company, BikkizTweau, is a IT training and education company with more than 600,000 subscribers.

BikkizTweau trains worldwide through its online and in-person education programs.

Her previous company, ClickZ, is one of the first sources of information in the world. He left it in 2018, a lifetime ago in Internet years.

Bikash was cited as a top thought leader.

Bikash is the worldâ€™s first Chief Content Officer and an acclaimed writer and communicator.

Bikash lives in Chitwan, where he stay with family and have beautiful girlfriend.

Backend Developer.description: Build and manage server-side logic, APIs, and databases for applications.

Frontend Developer.description: Develop responsive, interactive user interfaces for websites and web applications.

API Integration and Development.description: Build and connect APIs for seamless communication between systems.

SEO and Website Optimization.description: Optimize website performance and rankings for search engines.

Web Scraping.description: Extract and process data from websites using tools like BeautifulSoup or Scrapy.

Machine Learning Model.description: Build simple predictive models using Python libraries like Scikit-learn.

Data Visualization.description: Create charts and graphs to visualize insights using tools like Tableau or Python.

Data Cleaning.description: Prepare raw data for analysis by cleaning and organizing datasets.

ETL Developer.description: Extract, transform, and load data from various sources into business intelligence systems.

Data Annotation.description: Label data for supervised learning tasks in machine learning projects.

DevOps Engineer.description: Automate deployment pipelines, CI/CD processes, and ensure system reliability.

Cloud Support.description: Manage and provide support for cloud services on platforms like AWS.

Server Deployment.description: Maintain, monitor, and optimize servers for reliability and performance.

Data Entry Automation.description: Automate repetitive data-related tasks with scripting and tools.

Automation Script Developer.description: Write scripts to automate workflows and repetitive tasks efficiently.
